casebody.data:
RIO PROPERTIES, LLC, d/b/a Rio Hotel and Casino, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Gloria Sturman, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Jeffrey Harris, an Individual, Real Party in Interest. No. 76431 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JULY 24, 2019

Deny.
